articles.title: Tyler's Fritz Hager III advances in American Idol competition - KLTV
articles.description: Tyler’s Fritz Hager III has made the cut once more in the current season of American Idol.
articles.content:
TYLER, Texas (KLTV) - Tylers Fritz Hager III has made the cut once more in the current season of American Idol.
